name: Jima's Bastard Potatoes
description:
Videogame dedicated to the harvest, as the main theme of Untitled Game Jam # 9

Another mess that jima gets into,This time, she will help in his father's house, because the potatoes have decided to go to the city and finish with everyone, but it is the time of harvest, so, Jima grabs his rusty clipper and prepares to face those bastard potatoes.

Tested in Windows 10 ,i7 ,8 ram ,although I imagine it is valid for mid-range PCs
